| History                 = Gangsters For Life 2K were a black gang whose members branded themselves with 2K, using a hot iron with the initials 2K. The gang was decimated by [[Hammerhead (Joseph) (Earth-616)|Hammerhead]], using them to send a message to the other street gangs. That they were to align themselves with [[Mister Negative (Earth-616)|Mr. Negative]] or face the same fate.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 575|576}}
